A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Oh where to begin... I went into this film thinking we were going to get something with depth\, emotion\, and answers.  Instead it was just a giant mess.  The opening scene with Poe... so stupid.  What is with the idea that films NEED comedy all of a sudden?  Seriously\, it made me cringe.  I had hoped that was the last of it.  
Then we get to see Luke.  Rey holding his saber.  Luke taking it and tossing it over his shoulder.  Some audience laughter.  But come on.  They took a beautiful scene from TFA and turned it into a punchline.  
Milking a creature on the coast.  Dumb.
Porgs.  DUMB
Just so much of this movie was a waste.   I have no idea what is going on at Lucasfilm and Disney but it is like they could give a crap about what real fans WANT to see.  Instead they are just making it up as they go.  
Again another movie without a significant lightsaber battle.  
They had the absolute perfect opportunity to kill Leia off but no.  Lets have her now be space ghost Leia.  
Instead lets kill off Luke.  
And now what do they do about Leia?  I assume they held back footage of her to use in the third film.  
But we got literally no answers about anything.  And no real cliffhanger for the next film.  
I found myself mentally comparing this movie to Revenge of the Sith while I was watching it.  And I really am trying to figure out WHY the prequels are looked down upon so much.  At least the end of ROTS felt like Star Wars.  I was sad and happy at the end of ROTS.  
This movie just made me sad.  Sad for the fact that Disney simply does'nt get it.
